document.heading: Community Access to Health Care Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-288, the “Community Access to Health Care Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-913, which was referred to Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 14, 2006, and December 5, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-647 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-288 became effective on March 14, 2007.
